description:
It`s a summer festival, and the frogs decide not to come.  But it turns out that they do show up, after all... as the hosts of rigged games, in order to cheat festival-goers out of Gundam money!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grande confrontation à la fête du quartier / Keroro envahit les ondes radio
Keroro vs Natsumi Omatsuri Choujou Kessen! de Arimasu / Keroro Anata no Omimi ni Shinryaku Radio de Arimasu
ケロロVS夏美 おまつり頂上決戦! であります / ケロロ あなたのお耳に侵略ラジオ であります
